howToBuy.title: How to Buy
howToBuy.subtitle: Easy and practical! Follow these simple steps to shop for your favorite Indonesian food

step1.title: Choose Products
step1.description: Browse your favorite products from our Indonesian food catalog
step1.details: Use the search feature or category filter to easily find the products you want.

step2.title: Add to Cart
step2.description: Click the "Add to Cart" button on your chosen products
step2.details: Adjust the quantity of products you want, then add to your shopping cart.

step3.title: Fill Shipping Information
step3.description: Complete your name, address, postal code, and phone number
step3.details: Make sure the data entered is correct and complete so that the delivery can arrive correctly.

step4.title: Checkout via WhatsApp
step4.description: Click the "Checkout via WhatsApp" button to complete your order
step4.details: Your order will be automatically sent to our WhatsApp with complete purchase details.

step5.title: Admin Process & Ship
step5.description: Our team will process and ship the order to the destination address
step5.details: You will receive confirmation and tracking information via WhatsApp.
